room_title: Escape room "Pirate Quest" by Adventure Zone in El Paso
room_address: 251 East Redd Road, El Paso, TX 79932
room_description:
It was the year 1695 when the notorious Captain William Kidd was commissioned by the King of England to track down pirates for the crown. The Captain turned pirate himself and plundered any ship he came across in open sea. The crew eventually mutinied and abandoned ship, and the captain was tried for piracy back in England and executed.
The long-lost ship was discovered by our crew of pirates. However, they stayed aboard the ship too long and turned to stone. Your mission is to join our pirates inside the ship, solve all of the puzzles and escape with your lives before you too are turned to stone and become yourself part of the legend.
